name: Axolotl Museum
description:
Have you ever wanted to learn about the axolotl but realized searching for axolotl facts is just too boooooorrrrrriiiiiiinnnnnnngggggg? well you've come to the right place! here you can learn about the axolotl in an actually somewhat fun medium, a videogame! simply press "play game" and learn!

arrow keys / d-pad to move, z / A to interact and forward dialogue

Made in GB Studio: https://chrismaltby.itch.io/gb-studio

works on mobile or pc, i may update this a few times, who knows

i'm also working on another game, more info at https://discord.gg/2RD9v4AMca
